replies.body: How long did it take for you to make it? It looks so good! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
I agree. We need the cinematik version of Blitzcrank in-game, with updated walking animation.

I will point out that Riot has to be extremely careful with how complex they make the 3d models, as the game has to run on toasters. If everything isn't minimalistic and optimized, it can go downhill quickly

They should do a quick VU and voice update on all the old champs that are considered healthy and not in need of a rework. Surely riot has the resources to do this, and it makes them seem kinda lazy when they leave all these crappy looking ancient champs in the game.
